column2: Canterbury Park Holding Corp. engages in hosting and managing pari mutuel wagering activities. The company is headquartered in Shakopee, Minnesota and currently employs 257 full-time employees. The firm's pari-mutuel wagering operations include both wagering on thoroughbred and quarter horse races during live meets at the Racetrack and year-round wagering on races held at out-of-state racetracks that are televised simultaneously at the Racetrack. The firm operates through three segments: horse racing, Card Casino, and food and beverage. The firm's horse racing segment represents operations related to pari-mutuel wagering on simulcast and live horse races. The Card Casino segment represents the Company's unbanked card operations. The firm's food and beverage segment includes both concessions and catering and events services provided at the Racetrack. The Card Casino offers tableside menu service around the clock.
